name: Make Super Squishy - Simulator
description:
Do you like anti-stress soft toys such as sequins and slime? Play super squish on the phone screen, as in real life! Slide your finger across the screen, squeeze and drag hundreds of squash. Create your own unique Squishy - soft and cute, like real!
Why is the game cool:
- Super realistic simulator squash. Play like in life!
- Large selection of ready-made, beautiful squish 3D. Collect them all!
- Super 3d editor to create your own squishe!
- More than 100 colors, stickers, shapes and prints for your squash. Show your fantasy 100%!
- Unique anti-stress, like slim and sequins. Calm the nerves!
- Draw, color, decorate, pull squishys as you want!
- Clicker for money. The longer you play, the more you get!
- Play completely free! We do not require subscriptions!
- Squishy realistically react to your fingers. Control toys and surprise your friends!
- Play at home without the Internet or in any convenient situation!
- Save your squishs and show them to your friends!
- Super squishy on a Glitter screen!
- Evolution anti stress!
Rather, download the game and create your first unique squishy right now.
Leave comments and we will take into account all the wishes in the updates!
